channel.title: Path help, please
channel.description:
Hello, and thanks for visiting my topic :D
What would I type if I wanted to load the font:SmallChars from the SCAR root file using any text loading procedure? All help appreciated :D

item.title: Path help, please
item.dc:creator: @scarscaper4life scarscaper4life
item.description:
@scarscaper4life wrote:

um you just use sertupsrl;

if you are searching for letters e.g using finduptext(‘Open’);
then it would look for a capital O.

how ever if you used it like this: finduptext(‘open’);
then it would search for a small case o.

i hope that explained it

Read full topic
